4318500.name: My Friend Barrington
4318500.description:
Explore the psyche of an 11-year-old child, escaping into an imaginative world, where reality may not be too far behind. Play as your favourite toy, Barrington Bear, in a world of 2.5D platforming and fast-paced mechanics as you uncover a new sense of emotional awareness. Over the course of the game, learn the story of Jordan, a child dealing with the reality of their volatile parents.

As you navigate this dream-like atmosphere, watch out as your trauma seeps through from Full Motion Video (FMV) into your 2.5D world.
4318500.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
